application.name: moc2isis
application.brief: Import PDS formatted MOC image cube into Isis format cube
application.description: This program will import a PDS formatted MOC image into an Isis cube. The input file can be in MOC compressed format (extension = ".imq" normally) or uncompressed (extension = "img"). The program does not use the extension to determine if the file is compressed or not. It uses the label keyword "ENCODING_TYPE".

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: Input PDS formatted MOC EDR image file
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the MOC image filename. The file can be in either MOC compressed format or uncompressed format. The extension is not used to determine the compression status.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the output filename
